overview: He Ming, a photographer living in Paris, separated from his ex, and wanted to move the double mattress they used in the past to a new residence without an elevator. With the help of their new neighbor Han Ling, the two finally moved the mattress to the top floor room. In the closed stairwell, the two had subtle emotions. A new relationship seemed to have just begun, but it was full of uncertainty, and the mattress's destination was also full of contradictions.
title: Matelas Double
